text: ālahi bizuwochini zerefawochi yemitiwesidwachewi yeẖonuni tesifa āderegelachihu፡፡ yihichinimi le’inanite āsichekolelachihu፡፡ ke’inanitemi yesewochini ijochi kelekelelachihu፡፡ (litameseginutina) lemi’iminanimi milikiti iniditiẖoni k’et’itenyawini menigedi yimerachihumi zenidi (yihinini šeralachihu)፡፡
